name: Animal parkour
description:
Players who purchase this game will receive a completely standalone version of the parkour game. This game adopts a 2D perspective. The player controls the protagonist, the little fox, to avoid obstacles and obtain coins.
1.The game is a horizontal screen game
2.The game style is cartoon pixel style
3.The game is a horizontal screen parkour clearance type
4.The game operation is very simple, suitable for players of all ages
5.The game only needs to use the keyboard space and mouse clicks to complete the interaction
